items.title: Best Stocks: Two tech names bucking the market turbulence with businesses that can beat a recession
items.description: Josh and Sean discuss two new entrants to Best Stocks.

items.title: Made in the USA: This domestic manufacturer could benefit from tariffs, Canaccord Genuity says
items.description: Shares in the company that makes Coleman propane cylinders among hundreds of other products have soared 37% in 2025.

items.title: Goldman Sachs says this little-known health stock can withstand volatile macro environment, rise more than 35%
items.description: This health testing name may be insulated from President Donald Trump's tariff uncertainty, according to Goldman Sachs.

items.title: This fast-food chain offers a 'value-oriented opportunity' for investors, JPMorgan says
items.description: Wendy's recent pullback could provide an enticing entry point for investors, according to JPMorgan.

items.title: Warren Buffett's return tally after 60 years: 5,502,284%
items.description: Berkshire Hathaway has run circles around the S&P 500.
